Docs.summary: Provides static methods for creating channels.

Docs.typeparam: Specifies the type of data in the channel.
Docs.param: The maximum number of items the channel may store.
Docs.summary: Creates a channel with the specified maximum capacity.
Docs.remarks: Channels created with this method apply the behavior and prohibit continuations from running synchronously.
